name: Sales Account Manager CIS Region/Business Unit Catalyst
description:
Purpose of Job:

Drive the sales of ECO and H&C catalyst portfolio in the region. Including expanding competitive position and ensure high market penetration in the region.

Position duties:

  • Responsible for the complete sales process from aquisition, bid proposal including risk management, contract negotiations and after-sales services
  • Maintain customer relationship and customer's database
  • Direct customer contact for all commercial and technical matters,
  • Maintain business with existing customers by frequent technical and commercial meetings, account management
  • Support order processing, maintain an accurate order received and order invoiced forecast as input for resource planning, maintainance of reporting systems and customer's database
  • Develop & propose price/marging expectations based on market & competition analysis in line with the regional Business Unit and Business Segement strategy
  • Perform data evaluations, technical consulting, trouble shooting, evaluation of spent catalyst analysis in collaboration with the technical support team (local and global)
  • Liaise with technical service department and deliver technical feedback from the customer
  • Provide on site services, such as start-up assistance and operator/customer trainings in collaboration with the technical support team

Requirements:

  • A dynamic high-performing Sales manager
  • Excellent communication skills on all levels and professional demeanour
  • Excellent structural and analytical skills
  • 2-4 years business experience in international company major in sales/production of catalysts or technology for petrochemical area
  • Fluent in English
  • High level of MS Office (Excel, Outlook), SAP knowledge is of advantage
  • Masters degree or higher education in chemical engineering or chemistry ( additional Business Management skill or PhD title tecnology or chemistry is of advantage)
  • Market experience/expertise expecially in petrochemical market segment

We offer:

  • Sales Account Manager Position within Business Unit Catalysts
  • A job with high degree of responsibility and accountability
  • Being part of a strong dynamic team with international collaboration
  • Attractive and performance driven salary with social security benefits
  • Our commitment to further develop your personal skills
  • Full time employment Please provide your CV in English!
